fulltext:
HOÀNG VÂN 
NGUYỄN 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
(August, 2008-present) 
Schenker Vietnam Co., Ltd  
 2016-present: Operation Supervisor in Ocean Export Dept 
Lead 21 team members in Ocean Export Dept   
 Customer Service: lead team to have customer satisfaction. 
Enhance and maintain high customer service with the always 
attitude "take customers further” 
 Working Quality: lead team to fulfill job requirement by 100% 
follow SOP and working process, achieve target 98% in data 
quality,  handling shipment without additional charge, no 
complaints from customer and oversea. 
 Sales Support: support sale team to gain new business. 
 Working Attitude and Teamwork: connect members to build up 
teamwork and utilize the power of teamwork in daily works 
 Training : arrange training courses for teammembers to remind, 
update ocean product knowledge, new projects, policies and 
guidelines of company 
 2009 -2016: Customer Service Executive in Ocean Export Dept   
 Work as CS in charge of US, Canada, South America and South 
Africa accounts.   
 Control AMS, ISF, ACI, E-manifest, CAAT filling  
 2008 - 2009: Customer Service Executive in Air Export Dept.   
 Handle both booking and document follow SOP instruction.  
 Work with overseas to get their approval and special instruction  
 Negotiate with airlines to get the competitive rate to meet 
customer’s requirement.  
(August, 2007 – August, 2008) 
Expeditors International Freight Forwarding Co., Ltd   
Have job rotation from Documentation Officer to Customer Service 
Officer in Order Management Department.  
(May, 2006 - August, 2007) 
Scavi Joint Stock Company  
Export Leader in DDP Group   
 Negotiate with customer to fix the delivery date   
 Arrange suitable sailing schedule based on production and 
purchasing planning.  
 Issue origin customs declaration, oversea customs clearance 
and payment documents 
 Follow up the delivery date, compare the reality and target.  
 Issue evaluate forwarder’s service 
Address: 
152/20 Bong Sao Street, Ward 
5, District 8 
Contact: 
(84) 906763525 
Vnguyenh22@gmail.com 
Date of Birth: 
22-11-1984 
CAREER OBJECTIVE 
To find a challenging position 
to meet my competencies, 
capabilities, skills, education 
and experience 
EDUCATION 
(2012-2013) 
Master Of Business Administration - the MBA cooperation program 
between University of Western Sydney and University of Economics, Ho 
Chi Minh City   
(2002-2006) 
Bachelor of Business Administration - B.A degree in Foreign Trade, 
University of Economics, Ho Chi Minh City  
SKILLS 
 Good in training, attended “train the trainer” course, being a 
member of I-expert program 
 Good at working with systems, being a Super-user to train for new 
colleagues or keep colleagues updated if change  
 Good team management skills   
 Good communication skills, conflict handling skills, and 
negotiation skills   
 Hard working, work well with others    
 Strong sense of responsibility and able to work under pressure.
